title: Youdao Reports Second Quarter 2025 Unaudited Financial Results
description: HANGZHOU, China, Aug. 14, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Youdao, Inc. ('Youdao' or the 'Company') (NYSE: DAO), an AI-powered solutions provider specializing in artificial intelligence applications for the learning and advertising verticals, today announced its unaudited financial results for the second quarter ended June 30, 2025.

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Infosys Boosts AI and Cloud Capabilities with Versent Group Acquisition
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: India cenbank committee recommends AI framework for finance sector

title: DeepSeek's launch of new AI model delayed by Huawei chip issues, FT reports
description: Chinese artificial intelligence company DeepSeek has delayed the release of its new model after failing to train it using Huawei's chips, highlighting the limits of Beijing's push to replace U.S. technology, the Financial Times reported on Thursday.
